item.title: What is the bonus history of Authum Invest.?
item.description: Authum Invest has announced a 4:1 bonus issue effective January 13, 2026, meaning shareholders will receive four additional shares for every one share held. The record date and ex-date for this bonus are both January 13, 2026. Time: 50 minutes ago

item.title: Yuranus Infrastructure Q2 FY26: Operational Losses Deepen as Revenue Volatility Persists
item.description: Yuranus Infrastructure Limited, a micro-cap construction company with a market capitalisation of ₹47.00 crores, reported a net loss of ₹0.40 crores in Q2 FY26, marking a significant deterioration from the ₹0.16 crore loss in Q1 FY26. The quarter-on-quarter decline of 150% underscores mounting operational challenges despite a dramatic revenue surge. Time: 1 hour ago
